t: Kao launches new sustainable personal care line MyKirei in the USA - Premium Beauty News
s: April 6, 2020 - With MyKirei, Kao bets on the clean beauty trend to gain some name recognition with consumers in the USA. Indeed, the Japanese word ‘kirei’ describes something that is clean, well-ordered and beautiful, all at the same time.
